sentence.Network_en: We have omitted footnotes which we judged inessential to the text.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们略掉了我们认为对正文不甚紧要的脚注。

sentence.Network_en: In naturalistic novels such inessential things as a minor character's physiognomy and costume are depicted in minute detail.
sentence.Network_cn: 在自然主义的小说里,有些不关本质的东西,像一个次要人物的面貌和衣服之类,都描写得很详细.

entry.def: If something is inessential, you do not need it.

example.ex: We have omitted footnotes which we judged inessential to the text.
example.tran: 我们略掉了我们认为对正文不甚紧要的脚注。

auth_sentence.content: His inessential figure cast no shade Upon the golden floor.
auth_sentence.res_content: His inessential figure cast no shade Upon the golden floor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His inessential figure cast no shade Upon the golden floor.

auth_sentence.content: They're fine-enough extras, but inessential compared to the vital originals.
auth_sentence.res_content: They're fine-enough extras, but inessential compared to the vital originals.

auth_sentence.content: Half the tracks, though, if not fillers, are inessential.
